personal.name: Yuvaraj Misal
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.subtitle: ReactJs, NextJs, and WordPress (Theme Development)
personal.bio: Hey there! I'm Yuvaraj Misal, a Software Engineer fresher, specializing in Html,Css, Javascript, TypeScript, Expressjs, NextJs, and NodeJs, MonGoDb (Theme Development).
personal.about: I'm passionate about building user-friendly interfaces and web experiences. I started my web development journey by crafting websites with the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JS. I've worked at Axioned as a Software Engineer and at Mastek as a Senior ReactJS Developer, creating scalable and high-performance web applications. I also know TypeScript, Prisma, GA/GTM and Shopify. I'm constantly exploring new tools and libraries to stay ahead of the curve.

privacy.cookiesMessage: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

services.title: React / Next.js Development
services.description: Building fast, scalable, and SEO-friendly web applications with React and Next.js.

services.title: WordPress Theme Development
services.description: Custom WordPress themes with ACF, optimized for speed and editorial experience.
